'''Northlander Bow Billet''' is a [[Forging Material]] used in [[forging]] 4-Star [[bows]] of the [[Infusion Series]], [[Prototype Series]] and [[Amethyst Series]].

==Alchemy==
{{Recipe
|type = Converting
|Midlander Bow Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2
|sort = Midlander Bow Billet;Dream Solvent
}}
{{Recipe
|type = Converting
|Borderland Bow Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2
|sort = Borderland Bow Billet;Dream Solvent
}}
